com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics3d.physics

Class PhysicsBody3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.PhysicsBody3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicBody3D, KinematicBody3D, StaticBody3D

    public class PhysicsBody3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Used as the base of all 3D bodies influenced by physics.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Handles transformation data between the shape model and body.

      • PhysicsBody3D

        public PhysicsBody3D(Shape3D shape,
                     float mass,
                     PhysicsBody3D.MotionState motionState,
                     int collisionFlag)
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape model for the body shape and rendering.
        mass - The mass of the body.
        motionState - Used for transformation data between shape model and body.
        collisionFlag - Handles flagging the data for collision handling.

    • Method Detail

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(CollisionBody3D otherBody)
        Checks to see if the provided collision body collides with the BODY.
        Parameters:
        otherBody - The collision body to check with.
        Returns:
        True if the number of contacts between the bodies is greater than 0.

        Returns:
